channel.title: How do i make it so npc's don't fight back?
channel.description: Well my last topic got spammed to hell. So sorry if this sounds rude but if you can't help me don't post. On my server all npc's fight back. How do i make it so they don't fight back? Obviously i have to remove something but what?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2008, 02:05:36 PM[/size][hr]no1?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2008, 04:12:35 PM[/size][hr].....

item.title: How do i make it so npc's don't fight back?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

  1. What did you do?
  2. Show us what you did, so we can help.
  3. If steps 1 and 2 are not followed, we dont know what you did and cannot fix it.
  4. Do NOT post multiple posts in a row.

Read full topic
